167a4('bum): mi 'gyur/ skye ba med pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro// 'dus byas kyi khams 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ 'gag pa
167a5('bum): med pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'dus byas kyi khams zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ zhi ba 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam
167a6('bum): par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'dus byas kyi khams dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ dben pa 'dus byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro// 'dus
167a7('bum): ma byas kyi khams stong zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas kyi khams mtshan
167b1('bum): ma med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ mtshan ma med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas kyi khams smon pa med ces bya bar
167b2('bum): rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ smon pa med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas kyi khams skye ba med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par
167b3('bum): mi 'gyur/ skye ba med pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas kyi khams 'gag pa med ces bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ 'gag pa med
167b4('bum): pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhi zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ zhi ba 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par
167b5('bum): rtog par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'dus ma byas kyi khams dben zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur/ dben pa 'dus ma byas kyi khams zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dag
167b6('bum): rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar zab pa de ltar brtag tu mi rung ba/ de ltar brtag tu mi rung ba'i spyod yul de ltar dra ba/ de ltar gsal ba/ de ltar blta
167b7('bum): dka' ba/ de ltar rtogs par dka' ba/ de ltar zhi ba/ de ltar bzang ba/ de ltar shin tu 'phags pa/ de ltar mkhas shing shes pas rig par bya ba de la yid ches par byed pa
168a1('bum): su yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma brjod ma bshad do// ji ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma brjod ma bshad pa de bzhin du
168a2('bum): 'di la sems can gang yang yid ches par byed pa med do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa
168a3('bum): rab 'byor/ 'o na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
168a4('bum): rnams kyang rgya cher rnam par ma bkod dam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bzung ba yang ma bstan nam/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa
168a5('bum): bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
168a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa
168a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyidadi dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
168b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad spong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
168b2('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang
168b3('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
168b4('bum): dang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
168b5('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting
168b6('bum): nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
168b7('bum): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams kyang ma bstan tam/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon
169a1('bum): par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba rnams kyang ma bstan tam/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
169a2('bum): ba la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes mi bya 'am/ des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du 'gyur zhes mi bya 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
169a3('bum): rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge pa'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dur du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa
169a4('bum): de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhes mi bya 'am/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
169a5('bum): ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro zhes mi bya 'am/ 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro zhes mi bya 'am/
169a6('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel
169a7('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur zhes mi bya 'am/
169b1('bum): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ theg pa gsum po nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /
169b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyang rgya cher bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brdung ba yang bstan
169b3('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang @
169b4('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong
169b5('bum): pab nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong
169b6('bum): pa nyid dang / mdza' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa
169b7('bum): nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
170a1('bum): dang / dran pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub
170a2('bum): kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom
170a3('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
170a4('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
170a5('bum): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems
170a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab
170a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar yang 'gyur ro/ / des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
170b1('bum): / du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i
170b2('bum): rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi gyur
170b3('bum): ro/ 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par yang 'gyur ro// mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa
170b4('bum): med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams
170b5('bum): cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis zhe na/ bdag mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sems can mi dmigs
170b6('bum): pa'i tshul dang / srog mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gso ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skyes bu mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gang zag mi
170b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shed can mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shed bdag mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
171a1('bum): shes pa po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthong ba po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
171a2('bum): 'du shes mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
171a3('bum): sna mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
171a4('bum): sgra mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ro mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi
171a5('bum): rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa mi
171a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul
171a7('bum): dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te
171b1('bum): reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg/
171b2('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs
171b3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i
171b4('bum): khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chu'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / me'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nam
171b5('bum): mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
171b6('bum): rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ming dang gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tsher
171b7('bum): ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sred pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
172a1('bum): rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bzod pa'i
172a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / shes rab
172a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
172a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs
172a5('bum): pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs
172a6('bum): pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang
172a7('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
172b1('bum): / nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams
172b2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stobs rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi
172b3('bum): yan lag rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / lam mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
172b4('bum): tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mthar gyis
172b5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par
172b6('bum): shes pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi
172b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang
173a1('bum): na pa pa migs pa'i tshul dang / sanas kyi chos ma zhes rnams pa sngags par rgyal dang / byams cad shes pa dang mdzumags pa'i rmam dang /
173a2('bum): lamakhyenam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i rnaMm dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi migs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa lta bur 'gyur / demam cho ldan pa shAr
173a3('bum): tshe dang ldan par 'gror la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum
173a4('bum): pa'i phyir na/ khyed chub sapas dpa rnasems dpa' chen po rnams dngas su bzung ba bstan/ sems dang bar skyed pa nas/ sems bcu babyud pa'i bar gyi byang chub semasor ba'i
173a5('bum): la 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / @sa
173a6('bum): 'im tha zin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / stong panyin dang / byin stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid ston pa nyin dang /
173a7('bum): stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus rgyas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thob ma dang tham mad
173b1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid/
173b2('bum): dang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba
173b3('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i
173b4('bum): bden ma bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas
173b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
173b6('bum): dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang /
173b7('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ni ci'i phyir bstan/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /
174a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan cing / des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzus te//
174a2('bum): skye bar 'gyur zhing des na mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba yin/ ci'i phyir na des sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i
174a3('bum): rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang
174a4('bum): phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par
174a5('bum): mi 'gyur ba yin/ ci'i phyir na 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ba yin/ ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
174a6('bum): chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs
174a7('bum): ba dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan pa yin/
174b1('bum): de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
174b2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi
174b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir
174b4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi
174b5('bum): phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// mtha' las 'das stong pa
174b6('bum): nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// dor
174b7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//
175a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i rgyu/
175a2('bum): gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
175a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyin
175a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to// nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung
175a5('bum): ba bstan to/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskrad pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
175a6('bum): drin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong parten
175a7('bum): dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
175b1('bum): / ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad//
175b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
175b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
175b4('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
175b5('bum): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
175b6('bum): ba med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
175b7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
176a1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes
176a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ / des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
176a3('bum): rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa
176a4('bum): pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur
176a5('bum): kyi bar du nam yang rgyu ma 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
176a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs
176a7('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / 'dral ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang
176b1('bum): / yang ldan par 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems// /
176b2('bum): bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu byin pa dang /
176b3('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang
176b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
176b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa
176b6('bum): nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
176b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi/
177a1('bum): yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang //
177a2('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang //
177a3('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob
177a4('bum): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
177a5('bum): dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems
177a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ / des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos
177a7('bum): can du yang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya/
177b1('bum): ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos
177b2('bum): pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam
177b3('bum): par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /
177b4('bum): mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par
177b5('bum): 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan
177b6('bum): to/ / sems dang po bskrad pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
177b7('bum): dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang
178a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi napa stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /
178a2('bum): 'dus rgyas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /
178a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid sto/
178a4('bum): pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
178a5('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa
178a6('bum): bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i
178a7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
178b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
178b2('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des
178b3('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ / des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa
178b4('bum): med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /
178b5('bum): bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las
178b6('bum): chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang
178b7('bum): rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs
179a1('bum): pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten//
179a2('bum): thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs
179a3('bum): su bzung ba bstan to/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
179a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
179a5('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong
179a6('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa
179a7('bum): nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
179b1('bum): / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang //
179b2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
179b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
179b4('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang
179b5('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan
179b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
179b7('bum): rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ / des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs
180a1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / dkur stir bya ba dang //
180a2('bum): phudud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa
180a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur
180a4('bum): ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag
180a5('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i
180a6('bum): spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas
180a7('bum): sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
180b1('bum): / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
180b2('bum): dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa
180b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/
180b4('bum): dang mi dmig pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang
180b5('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /
180b6('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
180b7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
181a1('bum): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa
181a2('bum): chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
181a3('bum): gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par
181a4('bum): shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
181a5('bum): la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phudud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
181a6('bum): 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul
181a7('bum): gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa med pa'i
181b1('bum): spobs pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las
181b2('bum): mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po brgya lnga pa//
181b3('bum): / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub
181b4('bum): sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
181b5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen
181b6('bum): po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa
181b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang
182a1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba//
182a2('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i
182a3('bum): bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
182a4('bum): par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzung
182a5('bum): kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang /
182a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang
182a7('bum): bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs
182b1('bum): su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba/
182b2('bum): dang bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
182b3('bum): las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis
182b4('bum): kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spob pa
182b5('bum): dang mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par
182b6('bum): 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to//
182b7('bum): sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
183a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong //
183a2('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
183a3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
183a4('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
183a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang
183a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
183a7('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
183b1('bum): shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig/
183b2('bum): pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par
183b3('bum): shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes
183b4('bum): bya'o/ / 'das na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge pa'i rtsa ba gang gis
183b5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur
183b6('bum): ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang
183b7('bum): mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa
184a1('bum): dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhug pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spongs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan
184a2('bum): pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems
184a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
184a4('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi
184a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
184a6('bum): dus stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma meng ba stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
184a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
184b1('bum): / nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs//
184b2('bum): lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
184b3('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
184b4('bum): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang
184b5('bum): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/
184b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes
184b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ / des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
185a1('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba//
185a2('bum): dang mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad
185a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro//
185a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgun 'chad pa med pa'i spongs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs
185a5('bum): pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spongabs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spong
185a6('bum): pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / mtha' las 'das pa'i stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang
185a7('bum): bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
185b1('bum): / tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang/
185b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
185b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
185b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
185b5('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
185b6('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa
185b7('bum): brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga
186a1('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dud/ zungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgya dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag/
186a2('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
186a3('bum): gyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtsed dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar
186a4('bum): 'brur zhes bya'o/ / des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs sunyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong nang dge pa
186a5('bum): gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim thor bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dud du byung ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa bde dag kyang dun sum tshogs par
186a6('bum): 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mgyur gyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chang bar mi 'gyur ro// 'jug pa med pa dang mnyam par
186a7('bum): gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa
186b1('bum): med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon//
186b2('bum): par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan
186b3('bum): to/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i ba
186b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyinang
186b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
186b6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
186b7('bum): pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
187a1('bum): dang yang dag par smod pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi man lag bdun dang / 'phags
187a2('bum): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar
187a3('bum): pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
187a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
187a5('bum): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang /
187a6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na
187a7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas
187b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//
187b2('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam
187b3('bum): bar gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /
187b4('bum): rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig
187b5('bum): rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
187b6('bum): yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims
187b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang
188a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
188a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
188a3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
188a4('bum): dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga
188a5('bum): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang // gzugs
188a6('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
188a7('bum): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshes pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so sa
188b1('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/
188b2('bum): kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar
188b3('bum): 'gyur zhes bya'o/ / des na mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis
188b4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/
188b5('bum): ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par
188b6('bum): gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun
188b7('bum): 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spongs pa dang / 'jig rten
189a1('bum): thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
189a2('bum): chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
189a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa
189a4('bum): nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
189a5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma meng pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams
189a6('bum): cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
189a7('bum): pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong nga bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
189b1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar/
189b2('bum): ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sto/ sa par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting
189b3('bum): nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen
189b4('bum): po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis
189b5('bum): rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o// des na mngon par shes pa rnams
189b6('bum): la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba
189b7('bum): dang bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom 'das de dag las chos gang
190a1('bum): zos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang /
190a2('bum): rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /
190a3('bum): mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / dor dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad
190a4('bum): zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bzung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa nas
190a5('bum): sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sem+ba dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
190a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
190a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid dang /
190b1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs
190b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba
190b3('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i
190b4('bum): bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
190b5('bum): padagu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams
190b6('bum): cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
190b7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang
191a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ / des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su
191a2('bum): nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /
191a3('bum): bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos
191a4('bum): gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam
191a5('bum): par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par
191a6('bum): gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i
191a7('bum): spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brdung ba bstan to// sems dang po bskyed pa
191b1('bum): nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyang rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
191b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
191b3('bum): dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las
191b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
191b5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
191b6('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
191b7('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par

192a3('bum): rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon
192a4('bum): par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes
192a5('bum): bya'o/ / rades na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas
192a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//
192a7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gnas
192b1('bum): pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun
192b2('bum): 'chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten

192b4('bum): yongs su bzung ba bstan to/ / sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ sems bcu pa bskyed pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyipha
192b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang
192b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong
192b7('bum): pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
193a1('bum): dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / jim nyid stong pa/

193a6('bum): dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang bstan/ byang chub sems dpa'
193a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba dag kyang bstan te/ des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu
193b1('bum): byin pa la spyod cing rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhes bya'o/ / des na mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su nyams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du//
193b2('bum): 'dong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i
193b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang
193b4('bum): rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'khrug pa med pa dang mnyam par gzhag pa med pa'i tshul gyis kyang rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag

193b6('bum): ba'i spobs pa dang / don dang ldan pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags shing khyad zhugs pa'i spobs pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// dngos

194a1('bum): dpa'i lam 'di lta ste/ sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
194a2('bum): tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa

194b5('bum): shes pa rnams la yongs su rnams pa med pa'i chos can du yang 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan
194b6('bum): 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pa de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro//
194b7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos gang thos pa de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma gyur kyi bar du nam yang rgyun 'chad par mi 'gyur ro// 'khrug pa med pa dang /
